column4: volume is really low, any thoughts to make it higher? and yes, I have played around with gnome alsa mixer and made sure nothing was muted and everything is turned up. if I turn mic up to far, I get scratchy winy noises.
i used to have a digital one listed but now I don't. aplay -l shows: card 0: VT82xx [HDA VIA VT82xx], device 0: ALC888 Analog [ALC888 Analog]
you could try reading this, perhaps it helps: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1153133
